title: How to get into League Coaching?
body:
So I've played Dota 2 at a professional level for about 3-4 years, and recently I've been making the swap to league. I started playing late last season, and since then I've climbed from silver 2 to platinum 2, still gaining 28 lp a game. So I should be able to make it to diamond 5 atleast as an ADC/JG main. 
I coached professionally in Dota 2, focusing on high elo decision making and mechanical play, and I think I've become experienced enough in LoL to begin doing that. I've been coaching some mid elo friends/players for free to get the hang of it.
But where do I go next? How can I move my coaching upwards to possibly paid or team coaching?

Side question: What is the standard form of coaching in LoL. I've been doing replay, 1v1 and in-game coaching, but my internet isn't good enough to stream.
